summary: Premium multi-page corporate website for UNAI — a luxury minimal technology company site with 8 pages (Home, About, Services, Products, Events, Careers, Gallery, Contact). Primary background #BDD8E9, deep navy/royal blue accent palette. Features parallax scrolling, glass morphism, serif headings, asymmetrical layouts, micro-interactions, dark/light theme toggle, and Awwwards-level premium design language.
architectural_notes: Multi-page site (8 pages): Home, About, Services, Products, Events, Careers, Gallery, Contact
Color system: bg #BDD8E9, navy #001D39, royal blue #0A4174, accents #49769F / #4E8EA2 / #6EA2B3 / #7BBDE8
Typography: serif headings (Playfair Display / Cormorant), sans-serif body (Inter), large letter-spacing
Parallax strategy: scroll depth scaling, floating shape layers, horizontal scroll sections, reveal-on-scroll fade-ins
UI components: glass morphism cards, soft shadows, 16–28px rounded corners, 300ms hover transitions
Spacing: 8pt grid, 120px+ section padding, 1200px max content width
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract technology hero background — deep navy to soft blue geometric network pattern with floating nodes and subtle grid lines (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- About section feature photograph — minimal modern office interior with large windows, soft blue tones, and clean architectural lines (about-feature.dim_900x700.png)
- Product mockup one — dark navy laptop screen showing a clean enterprise dashboard UI with data charts in blue tones (product-mockup-1.dim_800x560.png)
- Product mockup two — sleek mobile phone mockup showing a minimal AI analytics interface with soft blue gradients (product-mockup-2.dim_800x560.png)
- Product mockup three — isometric server rack illustration in deep navy and teal tones on a light background (product-mockup-3.dim_800x560.png)
- AI Development service illustration — minimal line-art brain and circuit pattern in navy and teal on transparent/white background (service-ai.dim_600x500.png)
- Enterprise Software service illustration — minimal isometric building blocks and code window in royal blue tones (service-enterprise.dim_600x500.png)
- Cloud Infrastructure service illustration — abstract floating cloud shapes with soft blue gradient and connection lines (service-cloud.dim_600x500.png)
- Data Analytics service illustration — minimal bar and line chart motif with soft blue and teal palette (service-data.dim_600x500.png)
- Consulting service illustration — two abstract human silhouettes in conversation with a network diagram overlay in navy tones (service-consulting.dim_600x500.png)
- Team portrait placeholder one — professional headshot style neutral portrait silhouette with soft blue background (team-1.dim_400x500.png)
- Team portrait placeholder two — professional headshot style neutral portrait silhouette with soft blue background (team-2.dim_400x500.png)
- Team portrait placeholder three — professional headshot style neutral portrait silhouette with soft blue background (team-3.dim_400x500.png)
- Team portrait placeholder four — professional headshot style neutral portrait silhouette with soft blue background (team-4.dim_400x500.png)
- Team portrait placeholder five — professional headshot style neutral portrait silhouette with soft blue background (team-5.dim_400x500.png)
- Team portrait placeholder six — professional headshot style neutral portrait silhouette with soft blue background (team-6.dim_400x500.png)
- Gallery image events one — wide shot of a technology conference hall with blue stage lighting and audience silhouettes (gallery-events-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image events two — close-up of a speaker at a podium with a large screen displaying the UNAI wordmark (gallery-events-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image events three — overhead view of a round-table discussion with laptops and notebooks in a modern boardroom (gallery-events-3.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image products one — lifestyle flat-lay of product devices on a navy surface with minimal props (gallery-products-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image products two — dark studio product render of a glowing screen device against deep navy backdrop (gallery-products-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image products three — isometric 3D render of software interface blocks floating in blue gradient space (gallery-products-3.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image office one — bright open-plan tech office interior with floor-to-ceiling windows and clean desks (gallery-office-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image office two — close-up of a modern reception desk with the UNAI name carved in frosted glass (gallery-office-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image office three — minimalist breakout lounge area with curved seating and soft blue accent walls (gallery-office-3.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image webinar one — laptop screen showing a video call grid of professional participants in a bright room (gallery-webinar-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image webinar two — split screen of a presenter and a slide deck about AI transformation in navy and white (gallery-webinar-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery image webinar three — top-down view of a person typing at a desk with a webinar interface visible on screen (gallery-webinar-3.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Establish a global design system and theme foundation: primary background #BDD8E9, accent palette (#001D39 Deep Navy, #0A4174 Royal Blue, #49769F Muted Blue, #4E8EA2 Teal, #6EA2B3 Soft Blue, #7BBDE8 Highlight Blue). Load Google Fonts: Playfair Display (or Cormorant Garamond) for all headings with large letter-spacing, Inter for all body text. Define CSS custom properties for all palette colors, spacing (8pt grid), and corner radii (16–28px). Apply 120px+ vertical section padding and max-width 1200px content container globally.

Implement global premium UI features: (1) Custom cursor — a small soft circle that scales up on hoverable elements. (2) Page load animation — a brief full-screen fade/slide reveal with the UNAI logotype before content appears. (3) Smooth page transitions — fade or slide between routes (300ms ease-in-out). (4) Dark / Light theme toggle — dark theme uses #001D39 background with light typography; toggle persists to localStorage. (5) Scroll-reveal animations — elements fade and translate up (20px) into view on scroll using IntersectionObserver. (6) Reusable glass morphism card component: backdrop-filter blur(12px), background rgba(255,255,255,0.12), soft box-shadow, border rgba(255,255,255,0.2), border-radius 20px.

Build a persistent global Navbar and Footer. Navbar: UNAI logotype (serif, left-aligned), navigation links (Home, About, Services, Products, Events, Careers, Gallery, Contact), dark/light toggle icon, and a 'Talk to Us' CTA button. Navbar is sticky with a glass morphism background on scroll. Footer: minimal dark navy (#001D39) background, UNAI logo, nav links, tagline 'Technology with Purpose', and social icon placeholders. Section dividers between pages should use unique SVG or geometric line motifs instead of plain horizontal rules.

Build the Home page with six sections: (1) Full-screen parallax hero — split layout: left side has large serif heading ('Enterprise Technology. Reimagined.'), subtitle, and two CTAs ('Explore Services', 'Talk to Us'); right side has an abstract 3D-style tech visual (Three.js scene with floating geometric shapes or animated SVG). Parallax: background geometric shapes scroll at 0.3x speed relative to foreground. Floating glass cards overlay with micro-stats. Subtle particle layer. (2) About Preview — Z-pattern: left image, right text block with glass overlay card showing metrics: '12+ Years Experience', '350+ Projects Delivered', '18 Industries Served'. (3) Services Cards — 4 large glass cards: AI Solutions, Enterprise Systems, Digital Transformation, Consulting & Strategy. Each card has a custom icon, one-line descriptor, hover elevation (translateY -8px, shadow deepens), and animated border reveal on hover. (4) Products Highlight — horizontal scroll parallax strip with 3–4 product mockup cards sliding at 0.6x scroll speed; section title 'Our Products' floats above. (5) Events & Innovation — full-width dark navy (#001D39) section with high-contrast white heading, event preview cards, and a 'View All Events' link. (6) CTA Footer Section — minimal centered: large serif 'Let's Build the Future Together', subtext, and 'Start a Project' button.

Build the About page with a magazine-style asymmetrical layout containing: (1) Full-width typographic hero: large serif statement 'Technology with Purpose' with a side abstract image. (2) Vision & Mission section — asymmetric two-column: oversized faded numeral or icon on one side, mission text on the other. (3) Leadership Philosophy — centered large quote typography: 'Innovation with Integrity', followed by 2–3 philosophy pillars in a horizontal card row. (4) Why UNAI — 3-column icon grid with concise value propositions. (5) Horizontal scrolling Company Timeline — year markers and milestone text cards that translate horizontally on scroll (scroll-linked animation). (6) Team Culture section — minimal portrait placeholders in a grid; on hover, image slightly zooms, a soft overlay appears with name and role.

Build the Services page with alternating split-screen sections for each service. Each section: one half is a large visual/illustration placeholder, the other half is the service name, description, and a 'Learn More' link — alternating left/right layout for each row. Services: AI Development, Enterprise Software, Cloud & Infrastructure, Data & Analytics, Consulting. Add large faded vertical typography in the background of each section (e.g., 'AI', 'CLOUD') at ~8–10% opacity as a design motif. Include a vertical animated process timeline at the bottom: a vertical line with nodes that animate in (scale + fade) as they enter the viewport, each with a step title and brief description.

Build the Products page as a premium product showcase. Each product block contains: a large mockup image placeholder, product name in large serif type, a short specs line, a bulleted feature list, and a 'Request Demo' CTA button. Include at least 3 product entries. Add a Comparison Section below: a minimal grid table comparing products across key feature rows — clean lines, no heavy borders, alternating soft row shading.

Build the Events page with a card masonry layout. Event categories: Conferences, Product Launches, Tech Summits, Webinars. Each event card: category tag, date, event title, short description, soft glass card style with hover elevation. Include a parallax full-width banner section with the headline 'Where Innovation Meets Industry' over a dark navy background with a subtle layered depth effect. Add a category filter row (All / Conferences / Product Launches / Tech Summits / Webinars) that filters the visible cards with a smooth fade transition.

Build the Careers page with: (1) Culture Statement — full-width typographic section with a large serif headline and subtext about UNAI's culture. (2) Why Work at UNAI — horizontal row of 3–4 benefit cards with icons, each with a hover micro-interaction (soft lift). (3) Open Positions — accordion layout: each role is a collapsed row showing title and department; clicking expands to show description and an 'Apply Now' link. (4) Application CTA — minimal centered section: 'Shape the Future with Us' heading and a primary CTA button. (5) Soft animated background gradient — a very slow, subtle CSS gradient animation that shifts through the blue palette shades in the background of the culture statement section.

Build the Gallery page with a CSS masonry grid layout (varied card heights). Display at least 12 gallery items. Each item: on hover, the image slightly zooms (scale 1.05), a dark overlay fades in, and a title appears over the image. Category filter bar: All / Events / Products / Office — filters items with a smooth fade/reorder animation. Gallery items are categorized and filtered client-side using React state.

Build the Contact page with a split-screen layout: Left half contains a minimal contact form with glass-style inputs (rounded corners 20px, semi-transparent background, soft border, focus glow in #7BBDE8). Form fields: Full Name, Company, Email, Phone, Message, and a 'Send Message' submit button. Right half contains: a stylized placeholder map block (minimal flat-style rectangle with grid lines and a pin icon, no external map service), and below it: company contact details (address, email, phone) in clean typography. Page headline: large serif 'Start the Conversation.' spanning above the split layout. Form submission stores the message in the backend (Motoko actor) and shows a success confirmation inline.

Implement React Router-based multi-page routing for all 8 pages: /, /about, /services, /products, /events, /careers, /gallery, /contact. Each route renders the corresponding page component. Navigation links in the Navbar and Footer route to the correct page. All routes are handled client-side.

Generate all required static visual assets for the website: hero abstract tech background image, about section feature image, placeholder product mockup images (3), placeholder team portrait images (6), placeholder gallery images (12 across categories), and a service illustration for each of the 5 services. Store all generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated. Reference them by relative path in the frontend components.

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page: full-screen parallax hero, Z-pattern about preview, services cards, horizontal product scroll, events dark section, CTA footer
About page: magazine asymmetrical layout, vision/mission, timeline horizontal scroll, team culture hover reveal
Services page: split-screen alternating sections, vertical animated process timeline, faded background typography
Products page: premium showcase with mockups, specs, feature bullets, Request Demo CTA, comparison grid
Events page: masonry card layout, parallax banner, conferences/launches/summits/webinars categories
Careers page: culture statement, why UNAI, accordion open positions, application CTA, animated background gradients
Gallery page: masonry grid with category filter (All/Events/Products/Office), hover blur + zoom + title overlay
Contact page: split-screen with glass form inputs (left) and map + contact info (right), large typographic headline
Global premium features: micro-interactions, custom cursor, smooth page transitions, page load animation, dark/light theme toggle, scroll-reveal animations
Global design system: #BDD8E9 background, navy/blue palette, Playfair/Cormorant serif headings, Inter sans-serif body, glass morphism cards, soft shadows, 120px+ section padding

Backend (Motoko): Implement a single actor that stores contact form submissions. Define a ContactMessage record type with fields: id (Nat), name (Text), company (Text), email (Text), phone (Text), message (Text), timestamp (Int). Expose: submitContact(name, company, email, phone, message) → async Nat (returns generated ID), getContacts() → async [ContactMessage] (admin read). Use a stable array or stable HashMap for persistence across upgrades.
